column1: Smoque BBQ////I just can't love this place. I've tried. I  was here the first week they opened I wanted to love this place so much. I thought maybe it was due to newness but now it has been long enough that  I'm finally certain that Smoque just doesn't do it for me the way Fat Willy's or Honky Tonk BBQ does. To be fair
column3: and from reading reviews maybe that's my problem. The ribs I've had have been just ok and all of the sides I've tried here were nothing to remember. At this point I just don't see myself coming back. I'm not a fan of the layout of this place
column4: it's kind of uncomfortable and that wouldn't bother me if the food was good enough to distract me from it but it hasn't been
